items.sentence: Tom was the one who suggested that we do this.
Tom was the one who told me to read this book.
Tom was the only one who knew where Mary went.
If you need to borrow some money, let me know.
The Cold War began after the Second World War.
The pilot bailed out before the plane crashed.
The previous tenants left the place in a mess.
You\'re the only person I know here in Boston.
You\'ve already told me what I wanted to know.
A big crowd gathered at the scene of the fire.
Tom says he doesn\'t feel like swimming today.
Are you the one who taught Tom how to do that?
I understand it now, or at least I think I do.
I used to hang out in this park as a teenager.
I used to love it when Tom came over to visit.
I used to spend a lot of time studying French.
I used to think Tom was pretty good at French.
My mother always gets up early in the morning.
My parents have been divorced for a long time.
I\'d rather not eat Chinese food this evening.
